events.descr:
The theme is open, you can post shots of any kind
Two entries are allowed per photographer.
The photograph must be original and watermark is allowed on the photograph.
The photograph must be of the highest resolution possible.
Photographs that have been digitally altered beyond standard optimization i.e., removal of dust, cropping, and reasonable adjustments to exposure colour and contrast etc will be DISQUALIFIED.
Adult content of any kind will not be entertained and would lead to direct disqualification.
Winners are decided according to the number of likes.
Details Of Submission
The photograph must be posted on the wall of The Page Revamp( http://www.facebook.com/Revampthefest) on or before March 21 2015with the following details
Name-
Age-
Profession (Student/Working)-
College/Company Name-
Residential City-
Caption of the Photograph-
Camera Details-
Contact number-
Any photograph received after March 21 2015 will not be considered for the competition.

The theme will be given on MARCH 26TH.

Adult content of any kind will not be entertained and would lead to direct disqualification.

Two per team. Both should be from same institute irrespective of any branch.
They should bring their own necessities. Only place will be provided by us.
One hour time limit.
No cooked items and no pre prepared items.

Two per team. Both should be from same institute irrespective of any branch.
They should bring their own necessities. Only place will be provided by us.
One hour time limit.
No cooked items and no pre prepared items.

8 - 12 participants per team.
Teams may perform only hip-hop, jazz, western contemporary and alike.
Any number of teams from a college.
Music must be submitted in a CD in MP3 format and also a copy in a pendrive  1 hour before the performance to the event coordinator.
Duration : 8mins including the stage setup.
Teams must have a theme of their own

8 - 12 participants per team.
Teams may perform only Indian classical, Indian contemporary and alike.
Any number of teams from a college.
Music must be submitted in a CD in MP3 format and also a copy in a pendrive 1 hour before the performance to the event coordinator.
Teams must have a theme of their own.
Duration : 8mins including the stage setup.

Any number of participants from a college.
Classical and filmy dances permitted.
Music must be submitted in a CD in MP3 format and also a copy in a pen drive 1 hour before the performance to the event coordinator.
Duration: 6mins inclusive of stage setup.

10 - 12 participants + 3 accompanists permitted.
Any number of teams from a college.
Performance should strictly adhere to a particular theme (open).
Vulgarity of any kind will lead to disqualification.
Creativity will carry maximum points.
Single round performance only.
Music has to be given in a CD to the organisers 1 hour prior to the event.
Duration: 10+2 mins inclusive of stage setup.

Maximum number of accompanists (only students) is two.
Recorded music permitted. (Karaoke). The music must be submitted in a CD in MP3 format and also a copy in a pen drive 1 hour before the performance to the event coordinator.
Duration: 5 mins inclusive of stage setup.

Maximum number of accompanists (only students) is two.
Only non-filmy songs / Indian light music geet  /   ghazal  / bhajan can be presented 
Duration: 3 + 2 mins inclusive of stage setup.

events.event: SA RE GA MA PA   -    Solo Song(classical)
events.descr:
Maximum of 3 participants per college.
Shruthi box permitted.
Only classical (Hindustani / Carnatic styles) allowed.
Duration: 3 mins inclusive of stage setup.

Maximum number of accompanists (only students) is two.
Only English songs permitted.
Karaoke music permitted.
Music must be submitted in a CD in MP3 format and also a copy in a  pen drive 1 hour before the performance to the event coordinator.
Duration: 3 + 2 mins inclusive of stage setup.

3 - 8 participants per team.
Maximum 2 teams per college.
Participants may perform either western acoustics or Indian light music.
If required, Teams must bring their own instruments. Only drum kit will be provided.
Duration: 10+5 mins inclusive of stage setup.

events.event: ALL HELL BREAKING LOOSE   -   Battle of Bands
events.descr:
Minimum of 3 members.
Teams must send an MP3 track/ video of their performance on or before 15th march. Send an email to ‘revamp@revainstitution.org’ with subject ”Battle of Bands Entry”.
10 bands will be shortlisted for finals. No on-spot entries entertained.
Teams must bring their own instruments. Only drum kit will be provided.
Cover pieces are allowed.

Individual event
Time limit 3+1mins (getting on and off the stage)
Props can be used.

events.event: SWAGGERS OF THE GALAXY   -   Street Dance
events.descr:
6 - 12 participants per team. 
Recorded music permitted. Music must be submitted in a CD in MP3 format and also a copy in a pen drive 1 hour before the performance to the event  coordinator.
Event will be on faceoff basis.
Duration: 6 mins inclusive of floor setup.

2 Participants per team. 
Topic will be given on the spot.
Participants must bring their own materials. (Only chart will be provided)
Burning is not permitted.
Scissors can’t be used.
Duration: 90 mins.

2 Participants per team. 
 Participants must bring their own materials.
Duration: 90 mins.

Topic will be given on the spot.
 Participants must bring their own materials.(Only paper will be provided).
Duration: 90 mins.

2 Participants per team.
 Participants must bring their own materials.
 Any material can be used.
Duration: 90 mins.

2 Participants per team.
Teams can come up with theme of their own choice.
 Participants must bring their own materials.
 Any material can be used.
Duration: 90 mins.

No.of participants is 1+1(only as a volunteer).
Participants should bring their own colours and brushes.Time limit 60mins.
Theme will be given onspot.

Unlimited entries per college.
Normal NFS rules apply.

Unlimited entries per college.
5 members per team.
3 rounds to be played as terrorists and counter-terrorists.
Map will be decided on the spot.

events.event: HOW SLOW CAN YOU GO   -   Slow Drag
events.descr:
Each participant can participate only once.
Geared 2 wheelers for boys and non-geared for girls.
Fuel will not be sponsored.

3 participants per team.
Written preliminary round.
Rules will be given on the spot.

Duration is 3 mins
No instruments are permitted, only sounds made using the human anatomy.
Competition will be on Knock Out Basis

Competition will be on knock out basis.
Excessive profanity will lead to disqualification based on judge’s discussion.
Lyrics must be focused on humour /wit and ridiculing their opponent.

Individual  participation.
The event consists of three rounds, the winner of each round will proceed to the next round.
The participants will be blind folded for the final round.
Mobile phones will be provided.

Two per team. Both should be from same institute irrespective of any branch.
They should bring their own necessities. Only place will be provided by us.
One hour time limit.
No cooked items, pre prepared items and packed food items.
Rules will be given at the venue.

Individual participation.
Prelims: written round. Rules of the following rounds will be given as the event progresses.
No new participants will be entertained after prelims.
Stay calm, be smart and win the title.

Any no.of participants per college.
Topic will be given on the spot.
Duration: 60mins.

Speak on the topic given on spot without hesitation, repetition or deviation.
Normal JAM rules apply.

events.event: WAR OF WORDS   - Speech and Debate (English)
events.descr:
Any number of teams per college.
Each team should consist of 2 participants (one for the topic and one against it).
Topic will be given in the morning of the event day.
Duration: 5 minutes (3+1 for speaking and 1 min for rebuttal).

events.event: WAR OF WORDS   - Speech and Debate (Hindi)
events.descr:
Any number of teams per college.
Each team should consist of 2 participants (one for the topic and one against it).
Topic will be given in the morning of the event day.
Duration: 5 minutes (3+1 for speaking and 1 min for rebuttal).

events.event: WAR OF WORDS   - Speech and Debate (Kannada)
events.descr:
Any number of teams per college.
Each team should consist of 2 participants (one for the topic and one against it).
Topic will be given in the morning of the event day.
Duration: 5 minutes (3+1 for speaking and 1 min for rebuttal).

Maximum of 8+2 participants per team.
Open event.
Play should be based on a social issue.
Duration: 10+5 mins inclusive of setup.
Recorded music will not be permitted.

Duration: 15mins max.
Movies will be judged according to its quality and the message it conveys.
At least 1 actor and the director should be present at the time of screening. 
Film should be based on a social issue.
The Film can be in any language.
Any Film in language other than English should have subtitles in English.

Each participant shall be given 5mins.
PARTICIPANT MAY MIMIC SOUND of machines ,speeches of well-known persons ,etc. Including film personalities.
No language restrictions and excessive vulgarity will lead to direct elimination.

Open event.
Maximum number of participants allowed is 6.
The act should not contain any dialogues, lip sync, props.
No act shall contain any offensive, obscene, disrespectful actions or gestures. The act will be immediately stopped and the entry will be disqualified ,If these instructions are not followed .
Duration:10mins+2mins
